item.title: Amanda add a quote by Aristotle
item.description: "All human actions have one or more of these seven causes: chance, nature, compulsion, habit, reason, passion, and desire." -- Aristotle

item.title: Amanda add a quote by Tolstoy Leo
item.description: "If you want to be happy, be." -- Tolstoy Leo

item.title: Amanda add a quote by Leo Tolstoy
item.description: "In the name of God, stop a moment, cease your work, look around you." -- Leo Tolstoy

item.title: Amanda add a quote by Leo Tolstoy
item.description: "True life is lived when tiny changes occur." -- Leo Tolstoy

item.title: Amanda add a quote by Plato
item.description: "Be kind, for everyone you meet is fighting a harder battle." -- Plato

item.title: Amanda add a quote by Plato
item.description: "The madness of love is the greatest of heaven's blessings" -- Plato

item.title: Amanda add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "No one can make you feel inferior without your consent." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Amanda add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Amanda add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Amanda add a quote by Anais Nin
item.description: "Love never dies a natural death. It dies because we don't know how to replenish its source. It dies of blindness and errors and betrayals. It dies of illness and wounds; it dies of weariness, of witherings, of tarnishings." -- Anais Nin

item.title: Amanda add a quote by David Byrne
item.description: "Sometimes it's a form of love just to talk to somebody that you have nothing in common with and still be fascinated by their presence." -- David Byrne

item.title: Amanda add a quote by Alfred Lord Tennyson
item.description: "Tis better to have loved and lost Than never to have loved at all." -- Alfred Lord Tennyson

item.title: Amanda add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description: "I wish it need not have happened in my time," said Frodo. "So do I," said Gandalf, "and so do all who live to see such times. But that is not for them to decide. All we have to decide is what to do with the time that is given us." -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Amanda add a quote by Aristotle
item.description: "For the things we have to learn before we can do them, we learn by doing them." -- Aristotle
